scripts.release:all: npm run release:android && npm run release:ios
scripts.bundle:all: npm run bundle:android && npm run bundle:ios
scripts.bundle:zip: cd bundles && zip -r android-package.zip index.android.bundle drawable-* raw && zip -r ios-package.zip index.ios.bundle assets && cd ..
scripts.ota:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./bundles/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./bundles && cd bundles && zip -r ../android-package.zip index.android.bundle && (zip -ur ../android-package.zip drawable-* raw 2>/dev/null || true) && cd ..
scripts.ota:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./bundles/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest ./bundles && cd bundles && zip -r ../ios-package.zip index.ios.bundle && (zip -ur ../ios-package.zip assets 2>/dev/null || true) && cd ..
scripts.ota:all: npm run ota:android && npm run ota:ios
